title: [The Working women's centre]
creator_credit: Laura Butterworth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: As the Working Women’s Centre in South Australia faces budget cuts, Laura Butterworth reflects on the history of the centre, the stories of the women workers and the battles fought and won.
creator_credit_for_label: Laura Butterworth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
